      perhaps you'd rather have something even better

      HATCH, DAMMIT

3.1.25  8:30 pm   Out of all the songs you've written, which one do you think you relate to the most? I know that the "I" in your songs, the narrator of the story that is being told in the song, is not necessarily you...but for which song would you say "I"'s  experience/story is closest to yours? I don't know if I'm making sense...

      best case scenario, songs should be a myriad of simultaneous indescribable meanings. don't know where that leaves us in terms of pinning down an "I" exactly...

3.1.25  8:02 pm   Sorry if somebody already asked this, but like, what's it like never knowing what you'll be expected to have an answer for on any given day?

      don't we all know what that's like

      you're gonna have to just go there

      because you're closer to it in time/space

      tue wed thu fri sat sun mon sun mon sun

      goals

3.1.25  11:45 am   if i had to fight my past self in a duel, would it be fair to assume we'd both lose? Or would i win instead?

      it will seem like a stalemate until you discover one very unique out-of-the-box move that actually makes total sense for both of you in the big picture

3.1.25  7:46 am   i'm at the dollar store, want anything?

      how about a dollar with cheese

      if i get to write as many fiction stories as i want, i'd want to convey everything

3.1.25  12:52 am   why are there more than five things?

      because all five things together are also considered a thing





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

      it's like build

      i mean, it's different each time. this time it's blue

2.28.25  6:47 pm   i noticed that in your earlier videos, you would often use an effect where text would quickly flash between 2-5 colours. No matter how har i try, i can't find it in any of your newer ones. Did you think it wasn't a good effect, or were the alternatives just so much better?

      i probably THOUGHT i found a "better" way

      sure, i see what you're saying

      sometimes it's good to walk around the room and play "what do we know"

      there's probably no avoiding that

      no

      never done that

2.28.25  5:56 am   If you had to take a day away from a month and give it to another, which months would you choose?

      move august 31 to feb 29. leap day is feb 30

2.28.25  2:34 am   how many times does a person needs to think about a duck before the duck starts to think about them back?

      it depends more on your physical interactions with the duck

2.28.25  2:13 am   isn't it weird how the question "who is [name]" can be answered two ways? like, if i ask, "who threw that paper airplane", the answer is typically "[person] threw that paper airplane". but if i ask "who is agent 007", you could answer "agent 007 is an agent who works for MI6", or you could answer "james bond is agent 007". "agent 007" can be on either side of the "is"

      ah, questions are not so simple are they. now you know how i feel.

2.28.25  1:29 am   does subway tuna contain tuna

      i have no idea

2.27.25  11:32 pm   i was listening to alan watts and he made a pretty cool analogy about how spirituality is like a good wine, then he said how being near water is like a good wine, then he was talking about chinese paintings and how they were like a good wine and then he mentioned silence, which was like a good wine, im starting to think he really liked wine

      at least, those analogies probably don't work so well if you don't understand wine

2.27.25  11:23 pm   Why is there anything at all?

      why wouldn't there be everything? let me rephrase that: how couldn't there be everything

      i can't tell you

2.27.25  11:13 pm   how far up does the sky start

      it starts on the ground

2.27.25  10:43 pm   Say there was no seating chart, no seats were taken, and desks are arranged in rows/columns. Where are you sitting? Or I guess where would've you sat. 

      this revolves totally around what else is in the room besides the desks

2.27.25  10:35 pm   what does it mean that melodic minor is only raised on "the way up." what if the melody doesn't go straight up or down

      here's the way it happens: music is made, music happens, and then one day someone comes along and notices, either in their own music or someone else's, they notice "oh hey, i think i see a pattern, a certain type of habbit that some of us seem to be doing in music". and someone gives it a name and tries to summarize what the 'rule' is. it's possible that whoever named this one was listening to march of the broomsticks, maybe they weren't. But here's the golden rule: if you hear about a rule and it doesnt click with you, or you dont like it or you dont get it or you dont think it works, case closed. you dont need it, you dont want it, dont use it. you dont need to worry about it, and it's none of your business. The only tricks and patterns in music you ever need to worry about are those ones that you can hold in your hand and feel like "yes! i get it! i like this one, and i'm even ready to give it my own name if it doesn't have one already!"

2.27.25  9:41 pm   how much does the earth cost

      name your price

2.27.25  9:09 pm   what's the right way to find out what form of art lets you express yourself easiest?

      the thing you are looking for is actually most often found the 'wrong' way. how many movies have we seen with this classic story
